subject: 7+R Shifter Question
description_text:
Hey on the product page it only mentions compatibility with logitech and
thrustmaster products but I was wondering if the 7+R shift can function
connected to a Simagic Alpha Evo Wheelbase

conversations.body_text: Hi Sean Dutcher, It is recommended to connect the shifter directly to a USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC to avoid connection issues caused by unstable power supply from other wheelbases or USB hubs.Â
